metadata.name: CryptoRug 1
metadata.description: Crypto Rugs is a collection of 10,000 unique Rug NFTs with 3 core benefits: 1. Ride our Rugs in metaverses instead of Lambos 2. Use them as a decoration for your metaverse house/gallery 3. Be a part of a welcoming community in a closed discord channel “FUD”, where we share our intel about possible rug pulls and other upcoming dangers.
